title: What fashion would you like to bring back from the 1950s? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ladies stuff. Bluejeans with bright plaid flannel inside the cuffs that showed if you rolled your trousers up. Ankle high white cotton women’s socks. Guys stuff. English leather aftershave, especially in combination with loose cut tweed jacket with flat leather buttons, corduroy trousers, un-buttondown white cotton shirt and a wool necktie ( in the jacket pocket).
